column1:
#text_land {
      border: 1px solid #ccc;
      padding: 25px;
      margin-bottom: 30px;
    }
    textarea {
      width: 95%;
    }
    label {
      display: block;
      width: 50%;
      clear: both;
      margin: 0 0 .5em;
    }
    label select {
      width: 50%;
      float: right;
    }
    * {
      box-sizing: border-box;
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;
    }
    body {
      font-family: monospace;
      font-size: 1em;
    }
    h3 {
      margin: 1.2em 0;
    }
    div {
      margin: 1.2em;
    }
    textarea {
      width: 100%;
    }
    button {
      padding: .5em;
    }
    p {
      /*Here the sliles for OTHER paragraphs*/
    }
    #content p {
      font-size: inherit;
      /*So it gets the font size set on the #content div*/
      padding: 1.2em .5em;
      margin: 1.4em 0;
      border: 1px dashed #aaa;
      overflow: hidden;
    }
